title: Ep 29: Happy Gurliepop
itunes:title: Ep 29: Happy Gurliepop
description: Shannon just COULDN’T leave y’all hanging. Here is the *actual* final episode of season 2. Shannon rewinds to PB (Post-Barcelona) to give us updates on her life and new relationship. Since the last episode, she’s been to London not once, but twice, and she gives us details. Answering some popular questions, such as where she plans to live in the future, her tips for the "talking” stage, and figuring out long-distance relationships, Shannon opens up about her personal life and feelings for her new official boyfriend. So much smiling and good advice to hold you over until next season. Next time we see you, we’ll have those mic thingies. Be back soon!
